author: cecilecaillol
body:
#### PR description:

This PR aims to add emulator functionality for the standard Puppi MET algorithm, taking into account truncations due to the HLS implementation. Two versions of the emulator are supplied, one based closely on the HLS code itself, and another that aims to provide identical results with a more cmssw-friendly implementation.

#### PR validation:

Emulator outputs were checked against each other as well as the existing PuppiMet implementation without truncation, with close agreement found between all results.

Rebasing from https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/895

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Rebasing from https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/895
title: L1T Phase-2: Quantized Puppi MET emulators
